newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-QNI releases nickel output details.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-QNI releases nickel output details.

text.p: QNI Ltd released the following data for nickel production at its Yabulu refinery for the three months ended 30 September 1996.
NOTE: QNI said prolonged adverse weather conditions which have had a serious impact on mining operations in Indonesia and New Caledonia, persisted into the September quarter.
As a consequence, the quality and quantity of ore available in the first two months of the quarter continued to affect ore throughput and grades in particular.
The average grade of ore processed during this period was consistent with the previous quarter at 1.47 percent.
Reduced throughput and low average grades had an adverse impact on production.
Improvements achieved to nickel and cobalt recoveries during the period were offset by high levels of silica present in the first shipment of Philippine ore processed in early September.
The high grade of this ore increased the quarterly average nickel grade to 1.50 percent.
